DOC.detailed_description: This randomized Phase II selection study investigate use ipilimumab induction prior stereotactic radiosurgery ( SRS ) , versus induction , melanoma brain metastasis . Participants randomize Arm A `` Induction '' ( two dos ipilimumab prior SRS , two dos ipilimumab SRS ) versus Arm B `` No induction '' ( SRS first , follow 4 dos ipilimumab ) . Participants undergo multiple dynamic contrast-enhanced MRIs brain submit blood sample immune test .
